trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Bristol
There were 3 other sightings in Bristol on or around August 2nd 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and I were in our driveway talking when we both saw the object at aboutthe same time. It first appeared to us to be a large balloon and I told my wifeto bring the binoculars. Upon viewing the object, I saw it was a metallic discshaped object, wobbling and bobbing, yet nearly stationary at about 30-35 percent of the horizion. We ran and grabbed the camcorder and retrieved an amazing5 minutes of fantastic footage. We also tried to take still photos with adigital camera but the camera failed. I am ex military 13 years and well versedin aircraft recognition and believe me, this aircraft was not in any manuals.The disc hovered and bobbed for approx 5 minutes and headed off quickly to theNNW from our view.
Summary: Videotaped metallic disc flying above my house
